title: Update dropdown and select components
description:
Check and update dropdown/select components for UI 4 compatibility.

Components using UDropdownMenu:
- UserButton.vue
- TeamForm.vue
- TeamMembersDialog.vue

Components using USelect:
- TeamForm.vue
- TeamMembersDialog.vue

Check for API changes in options, events, slots.

Test: All dropdowns and selects work correctly
acceptance_criteria: All dropdown/select components working with UI 4
